name: jeremeamia/acclimate
description: Provides adapters for various third-party service containers.

suggest.aura/di: Install Aura.Di to use with the AuraContainerAdapter.
suggest.guzzle/service: Install Guzzle to use with the GuzzleContainerAdapter.
suggest.illuminate/container: Install the Laravel Container to use with LaravelContainerAdapter.
suggest.mnapoli/php-di: Install PHP-DI to use with the PHPDIContainerAdapter.
suggest.nette/nette: Install Nette to use with the NetteContainerAdapter.
suggest.pimple/pimple: Install Pimple to use with the PimpleContainerAdapter.
suggest.symfony/dependency-injection: Install Symfony DI to use with the SymfonyContainerAdapter.
suggest.zendframework/zend-di: Install ZF2 DI to use with the ZendDiContainerAdapter.
suggest.zendframework/zend-servicemanager: Install Zend Service Manager to use with the ZendServiceManagerContainerAdapter.
